      • get

        public batch get(int pID)
          throws DBException
        get an unlocked batch from a specific project, use update to update the user ID after getting a batch
        Parameters:
        pID - = project ID
        Returns:
        batch that isn't owned already
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem, including no batch

        Returns:

        Throws:
        DBException - in case of emergency

      • update

        public void update(batch b)
            throws DBException
        syncs the DB's batch table with the batch in memory
        Parameters:
        b - batch that needs to sync to DB
        Throws:
        DBException - if can't be done

      • delete

            throws DBException
        deletes a batch from the DB
        Parameters:
